summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to Sand Point Magnuson Park; authorizing acceptance of a $500,000 grant from the State of Washington Department of Community, Trade, and Economic Development to support the Magnuson Park Wetlands Restoration Project; making appropriations from the Shoreline Park Improvement Fund to support the Magnuson Park North Shore project and the Magnuson Park Wetlands Restoration project; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to carry out those projects; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund; all by a three fourths vote of the City Council.
